short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your savings and expenses as you shop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WalletWatchdog is a Chrome extension designed to help you monitor your online spending and savings, alerting you to your financial habits as you shop across the web. It alerts the user when making a purchase allowing them rethink their spending habits. WalletWatchdog allow tracks the amount the user saves from removing an item from their cart.
